item.title: Are Arsenal Title Contenders?
item.description: The FC crew preview a massive Sunday in the Premier League as Chelsea host Arsenal and Liverpool travel to face Tottenham. Plus, Alessandro Del Piero joins the show to break down Inter's visit to Juventus, analyze Napoli's chances to win Serie A and give tribute to Gerard Pique's illustrious career. item.title: Futbol Americas: MLS Cup Final Preview
item.description: On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar preview the MLS Cup Final between LAFC and Philadelphia Union. Head coaches Steve Cherundolo, Jim Curtin and Union goalkeeper Andre Blake sit down with Herc to preview the final. Also, the guys react to the FMF's attempt to lure Carlos Vela to return to El Tri. Is Vela's snub something, nothing or everything? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Gerard Pique Calls It A Career
item.description: The FC crew discuss Gerard Pique announcing his retirement from professional football and the reasons behind the decision to do so early in the season. Plus, Bruno Fernandes offers a strong message to Manchester united youngster Alejandro Garnacho, Zlatan Ibrahimovic criticizes Kylian Mbappe's decision to stay at PSG and Jurgen Klopp asks for players not to be criticized on playing in the World Cup. item.title: Gab and Juls: Will UCL exit change Juventus' philosophy?
item.description: Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Juventus' exit from the Champions League and ask whether there are positives to take from their elimination from the competition. The guys also go in-depth on Tottenham's 2-1 victory over Marseille, ask whether Liverpool can lure Jude Bellingham in the Summer, and whether Ansu Fati will start again for Barcelona this weekend. item.title: Futbol Americas: 2022 MLS Cup is set: LAFC vs Philadelphia
item.description: On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez talked about the following topics: Reaction to Philadelphia Union beating NYCFC to reach its first MLS Cup Final. What was the key to Union’s victory? Reaction to LAFC reaching its first MLS Cup Final after defeating Austin FC at home. They will host the final. Has LAFC proved doubters wrong? Analyze the question: Is the LAFC-Philadelphia final the DREAM FINAL? Reaction to the report from The Athletic that Inter Miami is confident Lionel Messi will join next summer. Are you buying this report? INJURY WATCH: Reaction to USMNT players being injured lately: Who can replace Weston McKennie. Herculez says that Brenden Aaronson is the right person. Reaction to Leeds United getting a crucial victory against Liverpool at Anfield. Did Jesse Marsch save his job with the win? Welcomed Portland Thorns attacker RAQUEL “ROCKY” RODRIGUEZ, fresh off winning the NWSL Championship. We talk about all things Liga MX final between Pachuca and Toluca. Pachuca won its 7th league title. - Is Pachuca the best well-run team in Mexico? - Which Pachuca player is more Europe ready? - Veljko Paunovic was appointed new Chivas manager. Is he the right fit? - Edson Álvarez finally talks about the reports that Chelsea wanted to sign him from AFC Ajax. He says he pushed hard for the move. Something, nothing or everything? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.content:encoded:
On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez talked about the following topics:

Reaction to Philadelphia Union beating NYCFC to reach its first MLS Cup Final. What was the key to Union’s victory?

Reaction to LAFC reaching its first MLS Cup Final after defeating Austin FC at home. They will host the final. Has LAFC proved doubters wrong?

Analyze the question: Is the LAFC-Philadelphia final the DREAM FINAL?

Reaction to the report from The Athletic that Inter Miami is confident Lionel Messi will join next summer. Are you buying this report?

INJURY WATCH: Reaction to USMNT players being injured lately:

 Who can replace Weston McKennie. Herculez says that Brenden Aaronson is the right person.

  Reaction to Leeds United getting a crucial victory against Liverpool at Anfield. Did Jesse Marsch save his job with the win?

Welcomed Portland Thorns attacker RAQUEL “ROCKY” RODRIGUEZ, fresh off winning the NWSL Championship.

We talk about all things Liga MX final between Pachuca and Toluca. Pachuca won its 7th league title.

- Is Pachuca the best well-run team in Mexico?

- Which Pachuca player is more Europe ready?

- Veljko Paunovic was appointed new Chivas manager. Is he the right fit?

- Edson Álvarez finally talks about the reports that Chelsea wanted to sign him from AFC Ajax. He says he pushed hard for the move. Something, nothing or everything?

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Leeds Light Up Liverpool
item.description: The FC crew react to a wild day in the Premier League as Liverpool lost 2-1 to Leeds, Brighton rolled over Chelsea 4-1, and Tottenham needed a late winner to beat Bournemouth. The guys question if Liverpool can get past their current defensive issues and argue as to why Chelsea came out so flat in what was an emotional game for Brighton. Plus, Jan Aage Fjortoft joins the show to break down Kevin De Bruyne's game winner against Leicester. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: ESPN Daily: NWSL abuse scandal, explained
item.description: Nearly a year ago, the National Women’s Soccer League faced a crisis. Explosive allegations from players of abuse, sexual harassment, and unrelenting coercion by one of the NWSL’s most successful head coaches set off a reckoning across the entire league. The commissioner resigned. Games were canceled. Players had no collective bargaining agreement and the specter of a canceled season loomed, all while governing bodies opened investigations into misconduct and toxic work environments. And on Monday, a long-awaited report investigating the failures of the NWSL was released by former acting attorney general Sally Yates, which detailed systemic abuse within the league, and specifically “a culture of abuse, silence, and fear of retaliation” that perpetuated the misconduct. Jennifer Karson-Strauss directed the new E60 film, “Truth Be Told: The Fight for Women’s Professional Soccer,” and joins the show to discuss the film’s investigation into allegations of abuse, sexual coercion and a toxic work environment in the league, as well as the lack of action taken by NWSL leadership. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Futbol Americas: MLS continues dominance over Liga MX

Then the guys discuss a pair of moves made by MLS clubs in the form of Christian Benteke to D.C. United and Sebastian Lletget to FC Dallas. Then Herc talks to TikTok star Noah Beck about participating in the All-Star Game festivities. Next, Orange County SC President Dan Rutstein joins the show to discuss the controversy surrounding LA Galaxy's exclusive arrangement proposal of Championship Soccer Stadium. item.title: Futbol Americas: Vela-Bale or Insigne-Bernardeschi
item.description: On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar is joined by Alejandro Moreno to discuss MLS' best duo. Is it Carlos Vela-Gareth Bale or Lorenzo Insigne-Federico Bernardeschi? Then Maurico Pedroza joins the show to talk about Santi Gimenez' reported move to Eredivisie's Feyenoord. Good move or bad move for the Cruz Azul forward? Then Bayern Munich's Alphonso Davies has a one-on-one sit down with Kasey Keller where he discusses his return for injury and Canada's qualification to Qatar World Cup. Then Jeff Kassouf joins the show to analyze the USWNT and recap their CONCACAF W Championship win. Which player made the most of her opportunity? Finally, Sacramento Republic GM joins Sebi to preview the U.S. Open Cup semifinal against Sporting KC. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
